医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
评估 GAAD 对肝细胞癌早期检测的有效性肝细胞癌 (HCC) 的早期检测对于提高慢性肝炎患者的生存率至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Evaluating-the-efficiency-of-GAAD-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Evaluating-the-efficiency-of-GAAD-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98375e48-56dd-446c-899c-58cb941c0541 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:35:28 -0400 Evaluating the effectiveness of GAAD for early detection of hepatocellular carcinoma
内生菌发酵提高草珊瑚中的异佛西丁水平Isofraxidin 是一种在药用植物草珊瑚中发现的重要香豆素化合物，据报道具有抗炎活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Endophyte-fermentation-boosts-isofraxidin-levels-in-Sarcandra-glabra.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Endophyte-fermentation-boosts-isofraxidin-levels-in-Sarcandra-glabra.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fe379fd-9fbc-47be-b913-360fe1c0ad2f Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:30:43 -0400 Endophyte fermentation boosts isofraxidin levels in Sarcandra glabra
活检证实的 MASLD 中晚期纤维化与肝脏并发症有关关于经活检证实的代谢功能障碍相关脂肪肝病 (MASLD) 的美国患者的危险因素和长期结果的数据有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Advanced-太多纤维化-linked-to-liver-complications-in-biopsy-proven-MASLD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Advanced-太多纤维化-linked-to-liver-complications-in-biopsy-proven-MASLD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f3ab9a-ee33-411f-826a-faa26f20126d Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:27:10 -0400 Advanced fibrosis linked to liver complications in biopsy-proven MASLD
研究揭示阻力训练休息对肌肉和力量的影响于韦斯屈莱大学运动与健康科学学院进行的一项研究调查了中断 10 周的阻力训练对最大力量和肌肉大小的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Research-reveals-effects-of-resistance-training-break-on-muscle-and-strength.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Research-reveals-effects-of-resistance-training-break-on-muscle-and-strength.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9418d2ea-4e5e-489d-8b5c-e8fdf4d3b580 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:22:38 -0400 Research reveals effects of resistance training break on muscle and strength
研究揭示夏令时对睡眠模式的影响随着本周末时钟拨慢，一项新的研究发现，春季将时钟调快一小时，秋季调慢一小时，对睡眠时间有显着但短暂的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-reveals-impact-of-daylight- saving-time-on-sleep-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-reveals-impact-of-daylight- saving-time-on-sleep-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56bd05b6-288a-4a81-8837-f1e033bf5e96 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:18:00 -0400 Study reveals impact of daylight saving time on sleep patterns
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究人员发现了心脏病发作后心脏愈合的关键蛋白质加州大学洛杉矶分校的科学家发现 GPNMB 蛋白是心脏病发作后心脏愈合过程中的关键调节因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/UCLA-researchers-identify-key- Protein-in-heart-healing-after-attack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/UCLA-researchers-identify-key- Protein-in-heart-healing-after-attack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c88559a-8634-4bc4-8722-fdc75c946862 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:04:06 -0400 UCLA researchers identify key protein in heart healing after attack
政治两极分化对公共健康构成严重风险2024 年选举季的新闻报道往往集中于党派分歧如何影响我们的政治。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Political-polarization-poses-serious-risks-to-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Political-polarization-poses-serious-risks-to-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=287e190f-c031-4d4f-9df8-c971a7a93992 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 22:00:04 -0400 Political polarization poses serious risks to public health
三级淋巴结构与改善肝癌患者的预后有关约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心研究人员的一项研究表明，术前免疫治疗后肝脏肿瘤中新描述的淋巴结样结构阶段可能对于成功治疗肝细胞癌患者至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Tertiary-lymphoid-structs-linked-to-improved-outcomes-in-liver-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Tertiary-lymphoid-structs-linked-to-improved-outcomes-in-liver-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec77b932-aba9-4a0f-b9bb-9f6fcd49de67 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 21:56:33 -0400 Tertiary lymphoid structures linked to improved outcomes in liver cancer patients
阐明肺部感染中铜绿假单胞菌的生存策略想象一下，在不断受到攻击的情况下试图适应新家。这就是铜绿假单胞菌感染肺部时所面临的情况，它不能同时传播和保护自己免受抗生素的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Unraveling-the-survival-strategies-of-Pseudomonas-aeruginosa-in-lung-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Unraveling-the-survival-strategies-of-Pseudomonas-aeruginosa-in-lung-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d08f58a-9e91-403f-835d-a9298a4cc763 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 21:47:07 -0400 Unraveling the survival strategies of Pseudomonas aeruginosa in lung infections
RNA修饰及其在癌症发展中的作用癌症是一种具有全球影响的疾病，与基因表达失调密切相关，而基因表达失调受到基因突变和表观遗传变化（包括 RNA 修饰）的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/RNA-modifications-and-their-role-in-cancer-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/RNA-modifications-and-their-role-in-cancer-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65dfe600-28bc-46a2-8718-fdd2579456a5 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 21:42:00 -0400 RNA modifications and their role in cancer development
